fd:events.change: [if($field == '2022-12-23'\, dispatchEvent(dateinput3\, 'custom:setProperty'\, {visible : true()})\, {}),if($field == '2022-12-23'\, dispatchEvent(dateinput4\, 'custom:setProperty'\, {visible : false()})\, {}),if($field == '2023-01-01'\, dispatchEvent(dateinput2\, 'custom:setProperty'\, {enabled : true()})\, {}),if($field == '2023-01-01'\, dispatchEvent(dateinput4\, 'custom:setProperty'\, {enabled : false()})\, {})]
